init.title: Enter your website domain
init.description: Please enter the external URL which can be used by ChatGPT to reach your Home Assistant from the internet.

verification_token.title: Enter verification token
verification_token.description:
Follow these steps to get a verification token generated by OpenAI. When it's displayed, continue in here before finishing the setup in ChatGPT.
1. Navigate to [ChatGPT](https://chat.openai.com/?model=gpt-4-plugins) and select GPT-4 with plugins
2. Open the plugin store
3. Click 'Develop your own plugin' in the lower right corner.
4. Enter the base URL you just set up as the domain and continue.
5. When the plugin is found, enter the following two values and continue:
    * Client ID: `https://chat.openai.com`
    * Client Secret: `1234` (or any other random value)
6. Copy the displayed token value into the field below and continue (i.e. if `'{"openai":"XYZ"}` is displayed, enter only `XYZ` below.
7. Continue here in Home Assistant before finishing the setup in ChatGPT.

abort.already_configured:
ChatGPT plugin can only be configured a single time.
Please remove and recreate it, if you need to update the configuration.
